description: Returns all journal export jobs for all ledgers that are associated with the current Amazon Web Services account and Region. This action returns a maximum of MaxResults items, and is paginated so that you can retrieve all the items by calling ListJournalS3Exports multiple times. This action does not return any expired export jobs. For more information, see Export job expiration in the Amazon QLDB Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: JournalS3Exports
nested_items.description: The journal export jobs for all ledgers that are associated with the current Amazon Web Services account and Region.

nested_items.name: LedgerName
nested_items.description: The name of the ledger.

nested_items.name: ExportId
nested_items.description: The UUID (represented in Base62-encoded text) of the journal export job.

nested_items.name: ExportCreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time, in epoch time format, when the export job was created. (Epoch time format is the number of seconds elapsed since 12:00:00 AM January 1, 1970 UTC.)

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current state of the journal export job.

nested_items.name: InclusiveStartTime
nested_items.description: The inclusive start date and time for the range of journal contents that was specified in the original export request.

nested_items.name: ExclusiveEndTime
nested_items.description: The exclusive end date and time for the range of journal contents that was specified in the original export request.

nested_items.name: S3ExportConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket location in which a journal export job writes the journal contents.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name in which a journal export job writes the journal contents.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix for the Amazon S3 bucket in which a journal export job writes the journal contents.
JournalExports-ForMyLedger/Testing/
JournalExports.
My:Tests/

nested_items.name: EncryptionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The encryption settings that are used by a journal export job to write data in an Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: ObjectEncryptionType
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 object encryption type.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a symmetric encryption key in Key Management Service (KMS). Amazon S3 does not support asymmetric KMS keys.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that grants QLDB permissions for a journal export job to do the following:
Write objects into your Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket.
(Optional) Use your customer managed key in Key Management Service (KMS) for server-side encryption of your exported data.

nested_items.name: OutputFormat
nested_items.description: The output format of the exported journal data.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If NextToken is empty, then the last page of results has been processed and there are no more results to be retrieved.
If NextToken is empty, then the last page of results has been processed and there are no more results to be retrieved.
If NextToken is not empty, then there are more results available. To retrieve the next page of results, use the value of NextToken in a subsequent ListJournalS3Exports call.
